value.name: CCTV images released after woman robbed of cash and bank card in Cippenham
value.description: Thames Valley Police is releasing CCTV images after a woman was robbed of her bank card and cash in Washington Drive in Cippenham. At 11.45am on January 8 (Friday), a woman aged in her sixties was moving shopping from her car into her property in Washington Drive in Cippenham.
